casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Henry Ford ADKINS 55P02-14 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Henry Ford Adkins, for Adkins, Henry Ford Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Craig Blitzer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*283The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
